detaileddescription.para: Contains accounts that are auto-reconnecting. The key is a pointer to the PurpleAccount and the value is a pointer to a FinchAutoRecon.

memberdef.name: ops
memberdef.initializer: = { NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, finch_connection_report_disconnect, NULL, NULL, NULL }

simplesect.para: The PurpleConnectionUiOps structure populated with the appropriate functions.
